definition: (onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]

sentences.english: The attorney, using sign language, asks the bookkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 律師於是用啞語問了會計。

sentences.english: We were arranged to learn some gesture language, the expert teachers were invited to the university to teach us some applied gesture language.
sentences.chinese: 學校安排了專業教師教授我們一些實用的啞語。

sentences.english: A woman to understand his love of sign language, she smiled and Chong He nodded in agreement.
sentences.chinese: 女人明白他的愛的啞語，她微笑着衝他點頭表示贊同。

sentences.english: At this time, the fisherman finally stopped his "silent talking", and started to talk in the real sense.
sentences.chinese: 這時漁夫終於不再打啞語，而開始真正說話了。
